title: Bug 114905: Default value set in list box of report parameter lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: When I set the default value in the list box of the report parameter and then modify the default value, the previously set default value is lost.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc' and set 'aa' as the default value, then click OK. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify 'aa' to 'aaa' directly and click OK. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog again.
